bill.summary: Inland Empire Perchlorate Ground Water Plume Assessment Act of 2011 - Directs the Secretary of the Interior, acting through the Director of the United States Geological Survey (USGS), to complete a study of water resources in the Rialto-Colton Basin, California, including: (1) a survey of groundwater resources in the Basin (including the identification of a recent surge in perchlorate concentrations in groundwater); and (2) a characterization of surface and bedrock geology of the Basin, including the effect of the geology on groundwater yield and quality.
